title: Orteil's NotAuthor Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:blankstyle]]

[[module css]]
#header h1 a::before {
    content: "Orteil's";
}
#header h2 span {
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}
#header h2 span::before {
    content: "NotAuthorpage";
    color: white;
}
[[/module]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:collapsible-sidebar]]


[[module CSS]]
:root {
  --header-title: "Orteil's";
  --header-subtitle: "NotAuthorpage";
 --logo-img: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Apride-highlighter/ace_logo_blk.svg)
[[/module]]


Oh hey. Yup, I have 3 positive articles, Guess I'll make an author page. Might as well make the URL a pun.
@@ @@

Why are you still here? Oh, you want to see my articles. Welp, that's your loss. Here they are


[[tabview]]
[[tab SCPs]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6386 SCP-6386:] Olympian Heroic Item Distribution™ **##green | Over 30!##**

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6403 SCP-6403:] An Undead Robot --Underneath Crete-- In Site-237's Basement **##green | Over 30!##** 

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6193 SCP-6193:] Der Wolpertinger und Der Tierpräparator **##green | Over 30##**

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6395-j SCP-6395-J:] [untitled fish article] **##green | Over 30!##**

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6153 SCP-6153:] Fortune (Co-Authored with [[*user NDHeckfire]], [[*user guiness11]], [[*user Evolie]], and [[*user Jhigard Foreigner]]. **##green | Over 30##**

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5526 SCP-5526:] This file is CLASSIFIED, by order of the Multiversal Foundation Alliance.  **##green | Over 30!##**
[[/tab]]

[[tab GOIs]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/kte-2957-white-cresentchild KTE-2957-White-Cresentchild:] Imperial Super-Soldiers **##red | Under 30##**


[[/tab]]

[[tab Tales]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/welcome-to-spectral-affairs Welcome to Spectral Affairs] **##green | Over 30!##**

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/standing-on-the-shore-at-dusk Standing on the Shore at Dusk] **##red| Under 30##** **CONTENT WARNINGS**

[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]

Ok, so on a bit of a more seruious note... me and my friends have been planning on meeting up irl and its really the only thing keeping me going. Money is tight for us, being teenagers and what not, and some of us have to travel 'cross the pond. If you feel like giving, its only a one-time donation, and it would be greatly appricated

@@ @@

[https://www.gofundme.com/f/trans-people-going-transatlantic]

@@ @@
